pageContext.claim: “The Justice Dept. should have stayed with the original Travel Ban, not the watered down, politically correct version they submitted to S.C.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump now insists that his immigration executive order is a "travel ban," and criticized others who used other terms to describe it. But this lacks context. His own administration repeatedly said the term "travel ban" misrepresents the executive order, and insisted that the immigration order is not, in fact, a "travel ban." Moreover, Trump decided to abandon the original version of the "travel ban," or the immigration executive order.
